S06n587:1: evamukte dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattva mahāsattvametadavocat-na khalu kulaputra tathāgatāḥ kutaścidāgacchanti vā gacchanti vā |
S06n587:5: na hi kulaputra anutpāda āgacchati vā gacchati vā |
S06n587:8: na hi kulaputra bhūtakoṭyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate |
S06n587:11: na hi kulaputra śūnyatāyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate |
S06n587:14: na hi kulaputra yathāvattāyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate |
S06n587:17: na hi kulaputra virāgasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate |
S06n587:20: na hi kulaputra nirodhasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate |
S06n587:23: na hi kulaputra ākāśadhātorāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate |
S06n587:26: na hi kulaputra anyatra ebhyo dharmebhyastathāgataḥ |
S06n587:27: yā ca kulaputra eṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ tathatā,
S06n587:35: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse'bhigate madhyāhnakālasamaye marīcikāṃ paśyet syandamānām |
S06n587:38: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kuta etadudakamāgataṃ kva vā tadudakaṃ gacchati,
S06n587:39: pūrvaṃ vā mahāsamudraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ vā paścimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā ?
S06n587:40: sadāprarudita āha-na hi kulaputra marīcikāyāmudakaṃ saṃvidyate |
S06n587:41: kiṃ punarasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate ?
S06n587:42: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto bālajātīyo duṣprajñajātīyo marīcikāṃ dṛṣṭvā anudake udakasaṃjñāmutpādayati |
S06n587:45: evameva kulaputra ye kecittathāgatarūpeṇa vā ghoṣeṇa vā abhiniviṣṭāḥ,
S06n587:46: te tathāgatasyāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca kalpayanti |
S06n587:47: ye ca tathāgatasyāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca kalpayanti,
S06n587:48: sarve te bālajātīyā duṣprajñajātīyā iti vaktavyāḥ,
S06n587:49: tadyathāpi nāma sa eva puruṣo yo'nudake udakasaṃjñāmutpādayati |
S06n587:53: na ca kulaputra dharmatā āgacchati vā gacchati vā |
S06n587:54: evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā |
S06n587:55: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra māyākāranirmitasya hastikāyasya vā aśvakāyasya vā rathakāyasya vā pattikāyasya vā nāstyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā,
S06n587:56: evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā |
S06n587:57: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragata ekaṃ vā tathāgataṃ paśyet,
S06n587:58: dvau vā trīn vā caturo vā pañca vā ṣaḍvā sapta vā aṣṭau vā nava vā daśa vā viṃśatiṃ vā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā,
S06n587:60: sa prativibuddhaḥ san ekamapi tathāgataṃ na paśyet |
S06n587:61: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti ?
S06n587:62: sadāprarudita āha-na khalu punaḥ kulaputra svapne kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattiḥ prajñāyate |
S06n587:64: dharmodgata āha-evameva kulaputra sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamā uktā bhagavatā |
S06n587:65: ye kecitkulaputra svapnopamān sarvadharmāṃstathāgatena nirdeśitān yathābhūtaṃ na prajānanti,
S06n587:66: te tathāgatān nāmakāyena vā rūpakāyena vā abhiniviśya tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti |
S06n587:67: yathāpi nāma dharmatāmaprajānanto ye ca tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
S06n587:73: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra svapnopamān sarvadharmān svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti tathāgatena deśitān yathābhūtaṃ prajānanti,
S06n587:74: na te kasyaciddharmasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
S06n587:76: ye ca na kasyaciddharmasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
S06n587:80: na te tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti |
S06n587:84: te ca bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ amoghaṃ rāṣṭrapiṇḍaṃ paribhuñjate |
S06n587:86: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra mahāsamudre ratnāni na pūrvasyā diśa āgacchanti,
S06n587:90: na vidigbhyo nādhastānnopariṣṭānna kutaściddeśebhyo digbhya āgacchanti,
S06n587:91: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyupādāya mahāsamudre ratnānyutpadyante |
S06n587:94: nirudhyamānāni ca tāni ratnāni ca kvaciddaśadiśi loke saṃkrāmanti |
S06n587:95: api tu khalu punaryeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ satāṃ tāni ratnāni prabhāvyante,
S06n587:96: teṣāṃ pratyayānāmasatāṃ na teṣāṃ ratnānāṃ prabhāvanā bhavati |
S06n587:97: evameva kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ kāyapariniṣpattirna kutaściddaśadiśi lokādāgatā,
S06n587:99: na ca ahetuko buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāyaḥ |
S06n587:102: api tu khalu punaryeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ satāṃ kāyābhiniṣpattirbhavati,
S06n587:104: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra vīṇāyāḥ śabda utpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati,
S06n587:108: tadyathāpi nāma droṇīṃ ca pratītya carma ca pratītya tantrīśca pratītya daṇḍaṃ ca pratītya upadhānīśca pratītya koṇaṃ ca pratītya puruṣasya ca tajjavyāyāmaṃ pratītya evamayaṃ vīṇāyāḥ śabdo niścarati hetvadhīnaḥ pratyayādhīnaḥ |
S06n587:109: sa ca śabdo na droṇyā niścarati,
S06n587:110: na carmaṇo na tantrībhyo na daṇḍānnopadhānībhyo na koṇānna puruṣasya tajjavyāyāmataḥ śabdo niścarati,
S06n587:111: api tu khalu punaḥ sarveṣāṃ samāyogācchabdaḥ prajñapyate |
S06n587:113: evameva kulaputra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāyaniṣpattirhetvadhīnā pratyayādhīnā anekakuśalamūlaprayogapariniṣpannā ca |
S06n587:114: na caikato hetuto na caikataḥ pratyayato na caikataḥ kuśalamūlato buddhakāyaprabhāvanā |
S06n587:118: evaṃ tvayā kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca draṣṭavyam |
S06n587:119: sarvadharmāṇāmapi kulaputra tvayā iyameva dharmatā anugantavyā |
S06n587:120: yataḥ kulaputra tvamevaṃ tathāgatāṃśca sarvadharmāṃśca anutpannānaniruddhāṃśca saṃprajñāsyasi,
S06n587:123: asmin khalu punastathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśe bhāṣyamāṇe mahān bhūmicālo'bhūt |
S06n587:124: sarvaśca trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāramahādaśamahānimittaṃ kampate prakampate saṃprakampate,
S06n587:130: sarvāṇi ca mārabhavanāni saṃkṣobhitāni jihmībhūtāni cābhūvan |
S06n587:132: te sarve yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena praṇatā abhūvan |
S06n587:135: śakraśca devānāmindraścatvāraśca mahārājāno dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ divyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiśca puṣpairavākiran abhyavākiran abhiprākiran |
S06n587:137: tava kulaputra anubhāvena adyāsmābhiḥ paramārthanirjātā kathā deśyamānā śrutā sarvalokavipratyanīkā,
S06n587:139: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-kaḥ punaḥ kulaputra atra hetuḥ,
S06n587:140: kaḥ pratyayo'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya ?
S06n587:141: dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva āha-imaṃ kulaputra tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ tava ca pṛcchato mama ca nirdiśato'ṣṭānāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmanutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho'bhūt |
S06n587:143: catuḥṣaṣṭeśca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajāṃsi vigatamalāni dharmeṣu dharmacakṣūṃṣi viśuddhāni ||
S06n587:144: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato'bhūt-lābhā me paramasulabdhāḥ,
S06n587:145: yasya me prajñāpāramitāmimaṃ ca tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ paripṛcchataḥ iyatāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛtaḥ |
S06n587:146: etadevāsmākaṃ paryāptaṃ kuśalaṃ bhavedanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ pariniṣpattaye |
S06n587:147: na ca me bhūyo vicikitsā pravartate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
S06n587:149: sa tenaiva prītiprāmodyena samanvāgataḥ saptatālaṃ vihāyasamabhyudgamya saptatāle sthitvā evaṃ cintayati sma-kenāhametarhi antarīkṣe sthitaḥ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmiti ?
S06n587:150: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhyudgataṃ dṛṣṭvā cetasaiva cāsya cittamājñāya divyāni cāsmai māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyupanāmayati sma,
S06n587:151: evaṃ cāvocat-ebhistvaṃ kulaputra divyaiḥ puṣpairdharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuru |
S06n587:153: tava hi kulaputra anubhāvena adya bahūnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmarthaḥ kṛtaḥ |
S06n587:155: ye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśo'prameyānasaṃkhyeyān kalpānutsahante mahāntaṃ bhāramudvoḍhuṃ yathā tvayā utsoḍham ||
S06n587:156: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakrasya devānāmindrasyāntikānmāndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamavākirat,
S06n587:159: svakena ca kāyena dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhicchādayati sma |
S06n587:160: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata-eṣo'haṃ kulaputra adyāgreṇa tavātmānaṃ niryātayāmi upasthānaparicaryāyai |
S06n587:161: sa ātmānaṃ niryātya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purataḥ prāñjaliṃ kṛtvāsthāt ||
S06n587:162: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā tāni ca pañca dārikāśatāni sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-etā vayamapi kulaputra tavātmānaṃ niryātayāmaḥ,
S06n587:163: vayamapyanena kuśalamūlena eteṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ lābhinyo bhavema,
S06n587:164: tvayaiva ca sārdhaṃ punaḥ punarbuddhāṃśca bhagavato bodhisattvāṃśca satkuryāma gurukuryāma |
S06n587:166: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śreṣṭhidārikāṃ tāni ca pañca dārikāśatānyetadavocat-yadi me yūyaṃ dārikā adhyāśayamanuvartadhvam,
S06n587:171: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāni kṛtvā tāni ca pañca rathaśatānyalaṃkṛtya sarvāṇi ca tāni dharmodgatāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya niryātayati sma upasthānaparicaryāyaiḥ-imāḥ kulaputra ahaṃ tavopasthāyikā niryātayāmi,
S06n587:172: imāni ca pañca rathaśatāni niryātayāmi paribhogāyeti ||
S06n587:173: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastasmai kulaputrāya sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu kulaputra |
S06n587:175: evaṃrūpeṇa ca tyāgacittena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate |
S06n587:176: evaṃ ca dharmabhāṇakāṇāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā śakyaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca śrotum |
S06n587:177: tairapi kulaputra paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhirevaṃrūpa eva tyāge sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudānītā prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca paripraśnayadbhiriti ||
S06n587:178: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni pañca rathaśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalaparipūrimupādāya pratigṛhṇīte sma |
S06n587:180: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanāt svakaṃ gṛhaṃ prāvikṣat sūryasya cāstaṃgamanakālo'bhūt ||
S06n587:181: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt-naitanmama sādhu pratirūpaṃ bhavet,
S06n587:184: yannvahaṃ dvābhyāmeva īryāpathābhyāṃ sthitvā sthānena caṃkrameṇa ca kālamatināmayeyam,
S06n587:185: yāvaddharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svakādgṛhānnirgato bhaviṣyati yaduta dharmasaṃprakāśanāyeti ||
S06n587:186: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sapta varṣāṇyekasamādhisamāpanna evābhūt |
S06n587:188: sadāprarudito'pi bodhisattvo mahāsattva sapta varṣāṇi dvābhyāmeva īryāpathābhyāṃ kālamatināmayan na styānamiddhamavakrāmayāmāsa |
S06n587:192: api tu kadā nāma dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'smātsamādhervyutthāsyati,
S06n587:193: yannu vayaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattva mahāsattvasya dharmāsanaṃ prajñapayiṣyāmaḥ,
S06n587:195: taṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaṃ susiktaṃ sumṛṣṭaṃ ca kariṣyāmo nānāpuṣpābhikīrṇam,
S06n587:196: yatra pṛthivīpradeśe dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca saṃprakāśayiṣyatīti cintayāmāsa |
S06n587:197: tānyapi śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuśikṣamāṇāni dvābhyāmeva īryāpathābhyāṃ kālamatināmayāmāsuḥ sarvāḥ kriyāstasyānuvartamānāḥ ||
S06n587:198: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyaṃ nirghoṣamaśrauṣīt-itaḥ saptame divase dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'smātsamādhervyutthāsyati,
S06n587:199: vyutthāya ca madhyenagarasya niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti |
S06n587:200: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ divyaṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ śodhayāmāsa sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhaiḥ pañcadārikāśataiḥ,
S06n587:202: svakaṃ cottarāsaṅgaṃ kāyādavatārya tasyāsanasyopari prajñapayati sma |
S06n587:203: atha khalu tā dārikāḥ svakasvakānuttarāsaṅgān kāyādavatārya pañcottarāsaṅgaśatāni tatrāsane prajñapayāmāsuḥ atrāsane dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti |
S06n587:204: evaṃ tāśca sarvā dārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanamāstīrya tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasya jātā abhūvan ||
S06n587:205: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ sektukāmaḥ |
S06n587:209: apyeva nāma asya sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyodakamalabhamānasya cittaṃ khidyeta,
S06n587:214: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt-yannvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhvā imaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam |
S06n587:217: mā rajodhāturito bhūpredeśāddharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāye nipatet |
S06n587:219: varaṃ khalu punarmamāyaṃ kāya evaṃrūpayā kriyayā vinaśyatu,
S06n587:221: api ca kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bahūni me ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre saṃsarato bhinnāni,
S06n587:225: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti pratisaṃkhyāya tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svakāyaṃ samantato viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svarudhireṇa sarvamasiñcat |
S06n587:226: tānyapi śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañcadārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuśikṣamāṇāni sarvāṇi tāni tīkṣṇāni śastrāṇi gṛhītvā svakasvakāni śarīrāṇi viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svakasvakairlohitaiḥ sarvamasiñcan |
S06n587:227: na ca sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāsāṃ vā sarvāsāṃ dārikāṇāṃ cittasyānyathātvamabhūt,
S06n587:228: yatra sa māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ labhet kuśalamūlāntarāyakaraṇāya ||
S06n587:229: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt-āścaryaṃ yāvaddharmakāmaścāyaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06n587:230: yāvaddṛḍhasamādānaśca yāvanmahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaśca anapekṣaḥ kāye jīviteṣu bhogeṣu ca,
S06n587:233: atha khalu śakro devānāmidrastatsarvaṃ lohitodakaṃ divyaṃ candanodakamadhyatiṣṭhat,
S06n587:234: samantācca tasya pṛthivīpradeśasya acintyaṃ paramodāraṃ gandhaṃ yasya divyasya candanodakasya paripūrṇam |
S06n587:236: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-sādhu sādhu kulaputra |
S06n587:238: sādhvī ca te anuttarā dharmakāmatā dharmaparīṣṭiśca |
S06n587:239: evaṃrūpeṇa kulaputra adhyāśayena evaṃrūpeṇa vīryeṇa evaṃrūpayā ca dharmakāmatayā taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudānītā ||
S06n587:240: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt-prajñaptaṃ mayā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanam |
S06n587:241: ayaṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaḥ susiktaḥ susaṃmṛṣṭaśca kṛtaḥ |
S06n587:244: dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dharmāsane niṣaṇṇamabhyavakireyam ?
S06n587:245: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat- imāni te kulaputra pratigṛhāṇa divyāni māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi |
S06n587:247: dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dharmāsane niṣaṇṇamabhyavakira |
S06n587:248: sa tasmai divyaṃ khārīsahasraṃ divyānāṃ māndāravapuṣpāṇāmupanāmayati sma |
S06n587:249: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā anyataraiḥ puṣpaistaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ puṣpābhikīrṇamakārṣīt,
S06n587:251: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saptānāṃ varṣāṇāmatyayena tataḥ samādhervyutthāya yena dharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat,
S06n587:252: anekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayāmāsa ||
S06n587:253: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahadarśanenaiva dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tādṛśaṃ sukhaṃ pratilabhate sma,
S06n587:255: tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitādeśanāyaduta sarvadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamatā |
S06n587:280: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāniṣaṇṇasyaiva tasyāṃ belāyāṃ sarvadharmasamatā nāma samādhirājo jātaḥ |
S06n587:305: evaṃpramukhāni ṣaṣṭiḥ samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇi sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratilabdhānyabhūvanniti ||
